name: Jinx Stuff
author: justin
info: Some additional options for temporary jinxes.
description: This global script adds some optional extra stuff to temp jinxes.- Jinx carryover:  temp jinxes don't clear on screen change- Jinx combiner:  temp jinxes will combine if you get jinxed again while jinxed- Jinx counter:  on screen display of how long in seconds the temp jinx remainsEasy to use all or choose individually.
setup: Only std.zh required.Set the JINX_CARRYOVER constant to 0 (zero) if not using, or leave at 1 if usingSet the JINX_COMBINE constant to 0 (zero) if not using, or leave at 1 if using.If using either of the above add JinxStuff(); to your global loop above the Waitdraw();  see the sample global script includedIf using Jinx Counter, scroll down the script file for those constants. There are numerous to set for this, all are commented.Add JinxCounter(); to the global loop above the Waitdraw();  see the sample global script included
